title: Star Guardian Miss Fortune completed!!!!

embed.description: Star Guardian Miss Fortune is finally finished! Took me like a week tho... These are so getting a price knockup once I do commissions...details take forever Credit to the Original artist here:&nbsp...

body:
Star Guardian Miss Fortune is finally finished! Took me like a week tho...

These are so getting a price knockup once I do commissions...details take forever

Credit to the Original artist here: twitter.com/5_ish

Go follow my Twitter and Deviantart for more posts just like this~!

Twitter: https://twitter.com/rjshadow1999

Deviantart: https://naishubuu.deviantart.com/

replies.body: Yeah I'm going to be "that guy". The art style is okayish but I don't see why you would need a week to do that tbh. Most artists who know what they do draw something like that in under 1 hour, maybe need a bit longer since lineart is a b*tch sometimes.. And you should work on poses and styles that actually fit your character instead of random cute girl fanservice.

When they say "this took a week" that doesn't mean they work on it 24 hours for 7 days. They probably just had a busy schedule, had an art block, or just worked on it in small timeframes throughout the week.
Thank you~! Someone understands that theres still life to live X3

when you said you were gonna be "that guy", I was really hoping for  you to not actually be "that guy"

man, you had to be though.

>Yeah I'm going to be "that asshole". 

That fits better.

> [{quoted}](name=Jeddy017,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=OYWJgo3f,comment-id=00010003,timestamp=2017-10-08T16:40:35.180+0000)
>
> That fits better.

I tried to help him to maybe get some better at drawing (I don't think he's bad at all) and everyone here goes full salt mode lol. Well okay didn't expect anything else from the boards, critics are not allowed here I understand ^^

Well, maybe being an actual critic would help.

>I don't see why you would need a week to do that tbh. Most artists who know what they do draw something like that in under 1 hour, maybe need a bit longer since lineart is a b*tch sometimes.

Okay.....AND? If you're going to criticize how long it took to make the pic, how about giving some tips to speed up the process? All you did was drop in here & say, "LOL dis noob is slow. Real artist can do this in an hour. Git gud scrub."
No tips, no advice, no references to those artists who can do it in an hour. No anything to help them learn how to make fanart faster. You're not criticizing, you're just shiting on them.

Also, why does even make how long it took them to make it? If it was a commission for someone or something they did for a project or company, sure time is important. Even then, 1 week isn't going to kill them. 
But this was a casual fanart piece made for fun. Let's also consider the fact that they have lives outside of their art.

>And you should work on poses and styles that actually fit your character instead of random cute girl fanservice.

This part is subjective as shit, bro. Some artist just like drawing fanservicey pics. There's nothing wrong with drawing how they want. Just because you don't like it doesn't mean they have to change it. It's not about fitting the character, it's about fitting the **ARTIST'S** own personal **INTERPRETATION** of the character into **THEIR STYLE**. Whether you like it or not is your problem, not theirs.
Something that is subjective is not something you can criticise. Subjective is about one's own personal taste.

So like I said Mr. or Ms. Asshole, if you want to be a critic, actually be a fucking critic.
This community is like to jump up and be sjw too much not everyone can come up with solutions but you can idenify problems. Doctors cant get rid of Hiv but they can diagnose it.
Not every criticism of someone’s behavior means they’re an sjw. Even if they were, the word isn’t a taboo.

they guy is critiqueing work and people go how dare you tell some one that its bad. is exactly what sjw is. sure its not nice and not gonna make him feel good but that it the point of saying it and that doesnt make it bad just his opinion.

> But this was a casual fanart piece made for fun. Let's also consider the fact that they have lives outside of their art.

> This part is subjective as shit, bro. Some artist just like drawing fanservicey pics. There's nothing wrong with drawing how they want. Just because you don't like it doesn't mean they have to change it. It's not about fitting the character, it's about fitting the **ARTIST'S** own personal **INTERPRETATION** of the character into **THEIR STYLE**. Whether you like it or not is your problem, not theirs.
> Something that is subjective is not something you can criticise. Subjective is about one's own personal taste.
> 
> So like I said Mr. or Ms. Asshole, if you want to be a critic, actually be a fucking critic.

My god the salt is real. Why are you so angry because I don't 100% like his painting? I mean it's not even yours. And having a negative opinion on something does not make me an asshole. Are you expecting me to write an essay whenever I don't 100% agree with how something is done? Mate sorry but I have a life beside LoL, aint nobody got time for that.

>I tried to help him to maybe get some better at drawing (I don't think he's bad at all) and everyone here goes full salt mode lol. Well okay didn't expect anything else from the boards, critics are not allowed here I understand ^^

These are your words, not mine. You're the one who wanted to be a critic here. If you didn't want to actually be a critic, how about you don't spout BS about wanting to be a critic next time?

hes not completely wrong. just because some one worked on it doesnt mean its the Mona Lisa. 
Its not too bad but its far from what i would consider good art.

> [{quoted}](name=Leylania,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=OYWJgo3f,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-10-07T22:38:05.012+0000)

Most artists who know what they do draw something like that in under 1 hour, maybe need a bit longer since lineart is a b*tch sometimes.. And you should work on poses and styles that actually fit your character instead of random cute girl fanservice.

first of all, not everyone is a god-level professional artist, not only that but this may not be his best medium
second, as someone else said, he could have taken a week because he only had like half an hour to work on it each day
third, it really doesnt matter if what he draws fits the character or not because its not like its official canon art its just what he felt like drawing.  thats the entire point of art, it can be whatever you want it to be

Most artists who know what they do draw something like that in under 1 hour, maybe need a bit longer since lineart is a b*tch sometimes.. And you should work on poses and styles that actually fit your character instead of random cute girl fanservice.

Most people don't have all the time in the world. Art commissions are usually a side job for artists, and 1 week is what I'd expect from something like this.
